TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField

summary.span: Represents a field that is displayed as an image in a data-bound control.

span.span: Represents a field that is displayed as an image in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可供資料繫結控制項 (例如和) 以顯示每一筆記錄顯示的影像。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display an image for each record displayed. 物件顯示的方式會根據使用它的資料繫結控制項。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控制顯示物件做為資料行，而控制項顯示為一個資料列。For example, the control displays an object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 若要顯示的影像，您必須將繫結物件欄位從資料來源，其中包含影像的 URL。To display images, you must bind an object to a field from a data source that contains the URL of an image. 這是藉由設定屬性。This is accomplished by setting the property. 可以使用格式化的 URL 值屬性。The URL value can be formatted by using the property. 每個映像也可以有與其相關聯的替代文字。Each image can also have alternate text associated with it. 無法載入，映像，或無法使用時，會顯示此文字。This text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded, or is unavailable. 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器也會將此文字顯示為工具提示。Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip. 您可以使用下列方法之一來指定顯示影像的替代文字：You can specify the alternate text for a displayed image by using one of the following methods: - 使用屬性來指定適用於所有影像的替代文字。Use the property to specify alternate text that applies to all images. - 使用屬性繫結至資料來源的欄位每個影像的屬性。Use the property to bind a field from a data source to the property of each image. 這可讓您擁有不同的顯示每個影像的替代文字。This allows you to have different alternate text for each image displayed. 當資料繫結，您可以選擇性地使用格式化的替代文字屬性。When binding data, you can optionally format the alternate text by using the property. 影像的 URL 值時`null`，無法顯示影像。When the URL value for an image is `null`, an image cannot be displayed. 您可以顯示的替代影像`null`藉由設定欄位值屬性。You can display an alternate image for `null` field values by setting the property. 而不是替代的映像，您可以藉由設定顯示的替代文字屬性。Instead of an alternate image, you can display alternate text by setting the property. 根據預設，所有宣告的欄位會顯示在資料繫結控制項中。By default, all declared fields are displayed in a data-bound control. 您可以隱藏藉由設定資料繫結控制項中的物件屬性`false`。You can hide an object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 您可以自訂的頁首和頁尾區段物件。You can customize the header and footer sections of an object. 若要在頁首或頁尾區段中顯示的標題，請設定或屬性，分別。To display a caption in the header or footer section, set the or properties, respectively. 若要顯示影像，而非文字標頭區段中，設定屬性。To display an image in the header section instead of text, set the property. 標頭區段可能會隱藏在物件藉由設定屬性`false`。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些資料繫結控制項 (例如控制項) 即可顯示或隱藏只控制項的整個標頭區段。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支援這些資料繫結控制項個別繫結的資料欄位的屬性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual data-bound field. 若要顯示或隱藏在資料繫結控制項的整個標頭區段，使用控制項的`ShowHeader`屬性 （如果有的話）。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available). 您也可以自訂的外觀藉由設定欄位的不同部分的樣式屬性的物件 （例如字型色彩、 背景色彩等等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子系 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||頁尾區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||標頭區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的資料項目的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件存放至控制項來顯示影像。The following example demonstrates how to use an object in a control to display an image. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/CS/ImageFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/VB/ImageFieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 將欄位加入至動態建立的資料繫結控制項時，通常會使用這個建構函式。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要以動態方式加入物件資料繫結控制項，請建立新物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合。To dynamically add an object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果您使用控制項，加入物件集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您以動態方式可以將欄位加入資料繫結控制項，強烈建議的欄位以靜態方式宣告，然後顯示或隱藏，視需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 以靜態方式宣告所有的欄位可減少的父資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式，以動態方式將物件集合控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to dynamically add an object to the collection of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldCtor/CS/ImageFieldCtorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldCtor/VB/ImageFieldCtorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed for an image in the object.

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed for an image in the object.

value.span: 中所顯示之影像的替代文字物件。

span.span: The alternate text for an image displayed in the object.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定在顯示之影像的替代文字物件。Use the property to specify the alternate text for the images displayed in an object. 無法載入或無法使用映像時，會顯示的替代文字。The alternate text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded or is unavailable. 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器也會將此文字顯示為工具提示。Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip. > [!NOTE] > 當這個屬性設定時，所有映像中顯示物件共用相同的替代文字。When this property is set, all images displayed in an object share the same alternate text. 或者，您可以繫結的替代文字到資料來源中的欄位設定而不是這個屬性的屬性。As an alternative, you can bind the alternate text to a field in a data source by setting the property instead of this property. 這可讓您擁有不同的顯示每個影像的替代文字。This allows you to have different alternate text for each image displayed. 如果兩個和設定的屬性，屬性會優先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定替代的文字中顯示的所有映像物件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text for all images displayed in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/CS/ImageFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/VB/ImageFieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string ("") values are converted to when the field values are returned from the data source.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string ("") values are converted to when the field values are returned from the data source.
if values should be converted to ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時候使用者可能會為欄位值，更新或插入資料錄時輸入空字串。Sometimes the user may enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records. 使用屬性來指定空字串值是否會自動轉換為`null`資料欄位的資料來源中的更新時Use the property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to `null` when the data field is updated in the data source > [!NOTE] > 類別顯示`null`為預設的空字串。The class displays `null` as empty strings by default. 若要顯示不同的值，設定屬性。To display a different value, set the property.

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object.

value.span: 要繫結的欄位名稱屬性中的每個映像的物件。

span.span: The name of the field to bind the property of each image in an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定名稱的欄位從資料來源，包含要繫結至值屬性中的每個映像的物件。Use the property to specify the name of the filed from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object. 可讓您擁有不同的替代文字顯示每個映像。The enables you to have different alternate text for each image displayed. 無法載入或無法使用映像時，會顯示的替代文字。The alternate text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded or is unavailable. 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器也會將此文字顯示為工具提示。Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip. > [!NOTE] > 您可以指定藉由設定適用於所有影像的替代文字而不是這個屬性的屬性。You can specify alternate text that applies to all images by setting the property instead of this property. 如果兩個和設定的屬性，欄位的優先順序。If both the and properties are set, the field takes precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定來源的資料中的欄位名稱，包含要繫結至值屬性中的每個映像的物件。The following example code demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/CS/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/VB/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataAlternateTextFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataAlternateTextFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataAlternateTextFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataAlternateTextFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataAlternateTextFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an object is rendered.

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 在其中指定的格式字串中每個影像的替代文字物件呈現。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示將特殊格式套用至的替代文字。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that now special formatting is applied to the alternate text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂格式中所顯示之影像的替代文字值物件。Use the property to specify a custom format for the alternate text values of the images displayed in an object. > [!NOTE] > 格式字串套用時，才屬性設定。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 無法套用時屬性設定。It is not applied when the property is set. 如果您要修改之欄位中包含的原始值，這非常有用。This is useful when you need to modify the original value contained in the field. 如果屬性未設定、 的替代文字值不會收到任何特殊格式設定。If the property is not set, the alternate text values do not get any special formatting. 格式字串可以是任何常值字串，而且通常包含了該欄位值的預留位置。The format string can be any literal string and usually contains a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式字串"項目值： {0}"，"{0}"預留位置會取代所指定的欄位值屬性。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the "{0}" placeholder is replaced with the value of the fields specified by the property. 格式字串的其餘部分會顯示為常值文字。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字串不包含預留位置，從資料來源欄位的值是不會包含在最後顯示的文字。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 預留位置是由以冒號分隔的兩個部分所組成 (":") 和包裝在大括號 ("{}")，在表單中`{A:Bxx}`。The placeholder consists of two parts separated by a colon (":") and wrapped in braces ("{}"), in the form `{A:Bxx}`. 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定欄位值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 這個參數是格式化語法的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 因為每個資料格中只能有一個欄位的值，這個值只可以設定為 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒號和冒號後面的值是選擇性的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定要在其中顯示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以貨幣格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定格式來顯示數值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以一般格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|數字格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示十六進位字元指定的大小寫。The format characters are not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字元 (一般的範例中為 xx) 後的值會指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示數的字。The value after the format character (xx in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字串"{0:F2}」 會顯示一個定點數 2 的小數位數。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with 2 decimal places. 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，將自訂格式套用至中影像的替代文字值物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to apply a custom format to the alternate text values for the images in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/CS/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/VB/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要繫結至欄位的名稱屬性中的每個映像的物件。Use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of each image in an object. 指定的欄位必須包含影像中顯示的 Url物件。The specified field must contain the URLs for the images to display in the object. 您可以選擇性地藉由設定格式化 URL 值屬性。You can optionally format the URL values by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 當已歸檔的值是`null`，無法顯示影像。When the filed value is `null`, an image cannot be displayed. 您可以顯示的替代影像`null`藉由設定欄位值屬性。You can display an alternate image for `null` field values by setting the property. 而不是替代的映像，您可以藉由設定顯示的替代文字屬性。Instead of an alternate image, you can display alternate text by setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要繫結至欄位的名稱屬性中的每個映像的物件。The following example code demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of each image in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/CS/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/VB/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an object is rendered.

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 在其中指定的格式字串中每個影像的 URL物件呈現。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，指出 Url 未套用任何特殊的格式。

span.span: The default is the empty string ("") , which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the URLs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂格式中所顯示之影像的 url物件。Use the property to specify a custom format for the URLs of the images displayed in an object. 當您需要產生的 URL，例如當時這非常有用物件只包含檔案名稱。This is useful when you need to generate a URL, such as when the object simply contains the file name. 如果屬性未設定、 URL 值不會收到任何特殊格式設定。If the property is not set, the URL values do not get any special formatting. 格式字串可以是任何常值字串，而且通常包含了該欄位值的預留位置。The format string can be any literal string and usually contains a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式字串"項目值： {0}"，"{0}"預留位置會取代所指定的欄位值屬性。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the "{0}" placeholder is replaced with the value of the fields specified by the property. 格式字串的其餘部分會顯示為常值文字。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字串不包含預留位置，從資料來源欄位的值是不會包含在最後顯示的文字。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 預留位置是由以冒號分隔的兩個部分所組成 (":") 和包裝在大括號 ("{}")，在表單中`{A:Bxx}`。The placeholder consists of two parts separated by a colon (":") and wrapped in braces ("{}"), in the form `{A:Bxx}`. 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定欄位值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 這個參數是格式化語法的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 因為每個資料格中只能有一個欄位的值，這個值只可以設定為 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒號和冒號後面的值是選擇性的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定要在其中顯示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以貨幣格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定格式來顯示數值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以一般格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|數字格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示十六進位字元指定的大小寫。The format characters are not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字元 (一般的範例中為 xx) 後的值會指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示數的字。The value after the format character (xx in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字串"{0:F2}」 會顯示一個定點數 2 的小數位數。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with 2 decimal places. 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要套用自訂格式的 url 屬性值中的影像物件。The following example code demonstrates how to use the property to apply a custom format to the URL values for the images in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/CS/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/VB/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來擷取欄位的值從指定物件存放至物件。The method is a helper method used to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified object in an object. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 這個方法沒有傳回值。This method does not have a return value. 相反地，將欄位值傳回透過傳物件傳入的`dictionary`參數。Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter. 在呼叫方法之後，逐一查看物件來存取的欄位值。After the method has been called, iterate through the object to access the field values. > [!NOTE] > 若要包含在唯讀欄位值物件，傳入`true`如`includeReadOnly`參數。To include the read-only field values in the object, pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，供類別以決定何值轉譯時，顯示欄位設計工具中的物件。The method is a helper method used by the class to determine what value to display for a field when rendering an object in a designer. 如果無法擷取實際資料從資料來源，在設計階段，改為顯示這個方法所傳回的值。If real data cannot be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead.

span.para: 在擴充類別，您可以覆寫此方法以傳回不同的值，以顯示在設計工具中的欄位。
When extending the class, you can override this method to return a different value to display for the field in a designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由資料控制項與其呼叫物件與其相關聯執行基本物件初始化的欄位之前的欄位加來檢視欄位集合, 的執行個體。The method is called by the data control with which the object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a field collection. 資料控制項，例如和呼叫方法在其`CreateChildControls`方法，這類其他方法之前`CreateRow`呼叫以建立特定的資料列與資料。Data controls such as and call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods such as `CreateRow` are called to create specific rows with data. 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項所使用的物件來執行基本的初始設定物件。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for an object. 實作這個方法，如果您-衍生型別需要的任何物件初始設定之前它所擴展,物件與資料或控制項中方法。Implement this method if your -derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位的值時所指定屬性是`null`，映像無法顯示在物件。When the value of the field specified by the property is `null`, an image cannot be displayed in an object. 使用屬性來指定要在映像的位置顯示的文字。Use the property to specify the text to display in the image's place. 此文字通常表示一般影像無法使用或找不到。The text usually indicates that the normal image is not available or cannot be found. > [!NOTE] > 或者，您可以替代的映像時顯示的欄位值是`null`藉由設定而不是這個屬性的屬性。As an alternative, you can display an alternate image when the field value is `null` by setting the property instead of this property. 如果和同時設定屬性，屬性擁有優先權。If the and properties are both set, the property has precedence. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示欄位的值所指定的文字屬性是`null`。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text to display when the value of the field specified by the property is `null`. span.span: to indicate that the field values cannot be modified in edit mode; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，所指定的欄位值資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時，可以由使用者修改屬性。By default, the values of the field specified by the property can be modified by the user when a data-bound control is in edit mode. 若要避免使用者變更欄位的值，請將此屬性設定為`true`。To prevent the user from changing the values of the field, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在物件屬性通常會包含欄位，其中包含要顯示在物件中之影像的 Url 的名稱。In an object, the property usually contains the name of the field that contains the URLs to the images displayed in the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來表示欄位值，代表中顯示之影像的 Url處於編輯模式下，無法修改物件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the field values that represent the URLs to the images displayed in an object cannot be modified in edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldReadOnly/CS/ImageFieldReadOnlycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldReadOnly/VB/ImageFieldReadOnlyvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Represents the "this" expression.

span.span: Represents the "this" expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位用來指出物件應該繫結至資料來源本身而不是已歸檔的資料來源。The field is used to indicate that the object should bind to the data source itself rather than a filed of the data source. 在此情況下，物件所傳回的值方法將會顯示在欄位中。In this case, the value returned by the object's method will be displayed in the field.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ValidateSupportsCallback ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateSupportsCallback() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();
override this.ValidateSupportsCallback : unit -> unit

summary.span: Determines whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks.

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來判斷控制項是否包含在支援回呼的物件。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks. 這個方法已經作為空方法 （不包含任何程式碼的方法），表示支援回呼實作。This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

span.para: 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫此方法，指出是否根據欄位支援回呼所包含的控制項。若要指出支援回呼，實作這個方法作為空方法不會擲回例外狀況。有用的訊息，說明為什麼不支援回呼，否則擲回例外狀況。

Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks. To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
